Hi Elvis,

Could you please provide us with the data you are used so that we can reproduce the bug?

Meanwhile, we have done lots of enhancement in latest build of BIRT against xTab. There is a potentiality that your problem has already been fixed. If it is convenient for you please download a latest 2.2.1 version BIRT to see if the problem still exists. The latest BIRT build is available here: http://download.eclipse.org/birt/downloads/build.php?build=N-R1-2.2.1-N20070817-200708170934

Thanks.
Lin
